vulnerabilities.title: web3-core-method is vulnerable to prototype pollution
vulnerabilities.description: web3-core-method is a package designed to creates the methods on the web3 modules. A Prototype Pollution vulnerability in the attachToObject function of web3-core-method version 1.10.4 and before allows attackers to inject properties on Object.prototype via supplying a crafted payload, causing denial of service (DoS) as the minimum consequence.
